snippet: SCHWARTZ--Betty, civic activist and long-term Community Board 6 member, died peacefully on March 13. Graveside burial at Mt. Hebron Cemetery, Sunday, March 20 at 12:30pm. Contributions please to Greenwich House Senior Center. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SCHWARTZ--Betty, civic activist and long-term Community Board 6 member, died peacefully on March 13. Graveside burial at Mt. Hebron Cemetery, Sunday, March 20 at 12:30pm. Contributions please to Greenwich House Senior Center. 1/3
